meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Unite</kanji> something together and <kanji>fasten</kanji> it and you have <vocabulary>unification</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>generalization</vocabulary>. Nowadays this word is used to mean <vocabulary>management</vocabulary> in some contexts too.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
